RT @TFMRIRE: After a very distressing incident on her front door step, a member of ours has alerted us to serious misinformation being spreâ€¦
RT @TFMRIRE: 1. The constitution is in fact a legal documentat and does have an impact (and governs) Irish legislation. It is not a "set ofâ€¦
RT @TFMRIRE: 3. A hospital who failed to induce a pregnancy where an FFA has been diagnosed is not "mistaken". They are unable to under theâ€¦
RT @TFMRIRE: 4. The 8th Amendment is the reason the law cannot be changed. Without a referendum and a decision by the Irish people to #repeâ€¦
RT @TFMRIRE: Please help us to get out the correct information to the people who need it. Retweet us, share our Facebook posts, donate towaâ€¦
